enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: Matters relating to the least developed countries (LDCs)
sentences: This issue was first addressed by SBI in Plenary on Wednesday, 16 June, where LDC Expert Group Chair Laavasa Malua (Samoa) reported on the meeting of the Group in March 2004.
The Gambia offered to host the next Expert Group meeting.
On Thursday, 24 June, SBI adopted conclusions on the matter, without amendment.
Tanzania informed Parties of a proposed LDCs meeting prior to COP-10, inviting Parties to contribute financial resources.
